医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现镰状细胞性贫血儿童缺乏预防性护理洛杉矶儿童医院的一项研究发现，患有镰状细胞性贫血的儿童很容易受到严重感染和中风，但许多人没有得到可以帮助他们更长时间保持健康的预防性护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-finds-lack-of-preventative-care-for-children-with-sickle-cell-anemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-finds-lack-of-preventative-care-for-children-with-sickle-cell-anemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1861e723-858c-4a1e-a5be-0d7c6766590f Wed, 06 Mar 2024 20:49:23 -0500 Study finds lack of preventative care for children with sickle cell anemia
研究项目获得2500万美元开发抗儿童癌症药物癌症是全世界儿童最常见的死亡原因之一。维尔茨堡大学参与的一个研究小组希望改变这一现状，目前其工作已获得大量资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Research-project-receives-25-million-US-dollars-to-develop-drugs-against-childhood-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Research-project-receives-25-million-US-dollars-to-develop-drugs-against-childhood-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=befa0bc5-d4c6-4acb-8c6a-59822bb177ae Wed, 06 Mar 2024 20:43:46 -0500 Research project receives 25 million U.S. dollars to develop drugs against childhood cancers
肯尼思·C·格里芬 (Kenneth C. Griffin) 捐赠 5000 万美元，用于推动西尔维斯特的研究足迹迈阿密大学今天宣布，Citadel 创始人兼首席执行官、Griffin Catalyst 创始人 Kenneth C. Griffin 向西尔维斯特综合癌症中心（隶属于迈阿密大学卫生系统和米勒医学院）捐赠 5000 万美元。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Transformational-2450-million-gift-from-Kenneth-C-Griffin-to-boost-Sylvesters-research-footprint.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Transformational-2450-million-gift-from-Kenneth-C-Griffin-to-boost-Sylvesters-research-footprint.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df43008c-289f-4f23-bd22-d4d16dc3575d Wed, 06 Mar 2024 20:20:14 -0500 Transformational $50 million gift from Kenneth C. Griffin to boost Sylvester's research footprint
2024 年大脑奖表彰计算和理论神经科学领域的开创性工作灵北基金会 (Lundbeck Foundation) 宣布了 2024 年大脑奖的获奖者，这是世界上最大的神经科学杰出贡献奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-Brain-Prize-2024-recognizes-pioneering-work-in-computational-and-theoretical-neuroscience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-Brain-Prize-2024-recognizes-pioneering-work-in-computational-and-theoretical-neuroscience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf4602b0-6acc-431c-9002-98fe6ed95a8b Wed, 06 Mar 2024 20:12:29 -0500 The Brain Prize 2024 recognizes pioneering work in computational and theoretical neuroscience
UAB 研究发现治疗高血压的新分子UAB 的研究人员对 TRPV2 进行了两项揭示性研究，TRPV2 是多种细胞功能中的关键离子通道，这表明它可能成为治疗高血压的新治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/UAB-study-identizes-new-molecule-for-treating-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/UAB-study-identizes-new-molecule-for-treating-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a7fb2be-ef47-4019-9872-c62675f42163 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:55:00 -0500 UAB study identifies new molecule for treating hypertension
新的跨学科中心旨在激发合成基因组学的发展应用和开发 DNA 合成新技术，为生产整个人工基因组铺平道路——这是海德堡大学、卡尔斯鲁厄理工学院 (KIT) 和美因茨约翰内斯古腾堡大学 (JGU) 正在建立的新跨学科中心的目标）。合成基因组学中心的目标是通过利用人工智能方法的基础研究和技术开发来激发合成基因组学的新发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-intersubjective-center-aims-to-spark-developments-in-synthetic-genomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-intersubjective-center-aims-to-spark-developments-in-synthetic-genomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea5aaaf8-bb5e-4211-add1-075cdab62566 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:44:11 -0500 New interdisciplinary center aims to spark developments in synthetic genomics
研究提供了对剪接修饰药物的作用和特异性的见解脊髓性肌萎缩症（SMA）是婴儿死亡的主要原因。不到十年前，冷泉港实验室 (CSHL) 教授 Adrian Krainer 表明，这种残酷的疾病可以通过调整一种称为 RNA 剪接的过程来治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-provides-insights-into-the-action-and-specificity-of-splice-modifying-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-provides-insights-into-the-action-and-specificity-of-splice-modifying-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e342f4cc-4cd6-409c-be36-4362978a2d15 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 19:39:13 -0500 Study provides insights into the action and specificity of splice-modifying drugs
夏令时辩论：批评揭示了死亡率研究的缺陷研究人员批评了一项关于欧洲夏令时 (DST) 和死亡率的研究，强调了统计分析和结论中的缺陷，认为最初的研究结果与之前的研究相矛盾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Daylight- saving-time-debate-A-critique-unveils-flaws-in-mortality-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Daylight- saving-time-debate-A-critique-unveils-flaws-in-mortality-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfd1a6ee-66cf-4d70-b0b8-9e6913b3257c Wed, 06 Mar 2024 18:31:00 -0500 Daylight saving time debate: A critique unveils flaws in mortality study
衰老的双重麻烦：虚弱和社会孤立加剧了健康风险研究表明，虚弱和社会脆弱性随着年龄的增长而增加，并与较高的死亡率和功能衰退有关，这强调了对老年人进行双重目标干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Agings-double-trouble-Frailty-and-social-isolation-deepen-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Agings-double-trouble-Frailty-and-social-isolation-deepen-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fc28efd-ce12-4f4d-bdff-bbfd5e8c2e16 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 18:16:00 -0500 Aging's double trouble: Frailty and social isolation deepen health risks
对基因组印记进化的新见解我们的一些基因可以表达或沉默，这取决于我们是从母亲还是父亲那里继承它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-the-evolution-of-genomic-imprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-the-evolution-of-genomic-imprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b94d5d67-a6c7-44a2-8515-3cfa33faf80a Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:52:00 -0500 New insights into the evolution of genomic imprinting
